name: Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 2
description:
Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 2 is an action-fighting game developed by CyberConnect2 Co.. It came out on 30-09-2004. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 2 on PlayStation 2.
It was produced by Hiroshi Matsuyama. It was directed by Hiroshi Matsuyama. It was scored by Chikayo Fukuda and Seizo Nakata.
